with love"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Indian Dress Wear Division"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan’s youngest brand is the result of wanting to revive one of the oldest occupations in our country – handloom weaving, Taneira brings together the length and breadth of the country with some of the most exquisite collections of handlooms like Mugas from Assam, Cottons from Chettinad, Tussars from Bhagalpur, Ikats from Gujarat, Andhra and Orissa, Jamdhanis from Bengal, Chikankari work from Lucknow, exotic Banarasi Silks, exquisite Kanjeevarams, heirloom pieces like Patan Patolas, Muslin Jamdhanis and so on. Its expansive collection of over 3,500 exquisitely beautiful sarees, lehengas, yardages, stoles and dupattas celebrates Indian craftsmanship and heritage."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.container2","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container2","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5 text-center d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Our Outstanding Achievements"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text6","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text6 text-center d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Showcasing our Best"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.container3","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container3","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.layoutGrid3","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid3 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.layoutGrid3$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.layoutGrid3$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.staticImage3","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage3","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Bhoogol_0.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Bhoogol"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text8","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text8","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"This collection is a creative reimagination of some of India's most gorgeous landscapes. It took many hands to recreate natural beauty of such magnificent proportions. Each saree is an amalgamation of multiple techniques. From Banaras, Jamdani, Kantha, Farad printing, Block printing, Aari embroidery and more, it is a true celebration of diversity of not just the Earth’s landscape but also of India’s rich crafts.Wonderful landscapes that have shaped our lives and thinking for centuries. Beautiful sarees that narrate beautiful stories; a collection we call : Bhoogol"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.layoutGrid3$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.staticImage4","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage4","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Ajanaa.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text9","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text9","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Ajnaa"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text12","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text12","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Inspired by the omnipotent Bindi and boldness of Shakti, this collection has hand painted batik & hand block printed Murshidabad silk sarees with Kantha embroidery in soft flowy drapes & contemporary designs. "},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.layoutGrid3$row0$column2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.staticImage5","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage5","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Vegan_Visions.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text10","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text10","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Vegan Visions"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"43.S.Wear.text11","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text11","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Taneira in collaboration with Tencel Luxe brings alive a collection that showcases a harmonious union of nature and technology. Woven from a yarn derived from renewable wood sources, these sarees drape you in elegance. The unique filament of the yarn gives the sarees a heavenly lustre reminiscent of silk while instilling it with a lightness making for a graceful, comfortable drape. "},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
